karma.text: Karma Quotient is the Resultant of your own Actions and Decisions in the Realms of Bodhi
In a nutshell, as you sow...so you reap
This means you have traversed through all the Realms in equal measure without prejudice.
You will have attained a 'balanced' Karma Quotient when you have a perfectly symmetric Pentagon as Karma Quotient.

kavach.text: You can win a Kavach each time you win an arena battle with perfect score.
This is the indicator of your perfect mastery over the arena subject.

chakra.text: Chakra count goes up when you have covered certain milestoes as you traverse all the Realms.
This is the indicator of a well-planned and well-balanced campaign while exploring.

vajra.text: You will win a Vajra when you are super fast and have just won the areana battle well before the time is over.
This is the indicator of a lighening fast intellect.
